entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Missing tag for v8.0.201 #39164
  • NETSDK1064: Package Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Analyzers, version 7.0.2 was not found #39163
  • Getting the error CS0103 The name 'paramName' does not exist in the current context in terminal but not in IDE #39162

Closed

  • dotnet workload update seems to do a lot of stuff #38953

PullRequests

Created

  • Trim trailing .git from sourcelink repo urls in container generation #39161
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Add an image digest label to generated containers #39160
    untriaged, Area-Containers

Updated

  • Use unique names for aliasing test packages #39144
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Issue #37237 #19650] Dotnet Cli Feature: `dotnet tool update --all` Updating all tools with one command #38996
    untriaged, Area-Tools
